event.json: {"msg":"#新声音量# 他们是音乐新生，期待着一场梦想的洗礼；他们是音乐新声，带着初来乍到的勇气，吟唱自信与无畏。7月2日起，网易云音乐携手七位新生代歌手——萨沙@小萨超人、@NaCl盐、@李霖辉Zac、@冯朗朗i、@刘洋Lee、@二珂呀呀呀、@周士原，陆续为你呈现十四首新鲜有态度的音乐作品！[星星]新声音量，无畏盛放。他们的声音，等待被你听见！敬请期待>>https://music.163.com/m/at/5b20ad991002137461e83c60?userid=620170413","mv":{"id":5955279,"name":"网易云音乐“新声音量”计划盛放版宣传片","status":0,"artist":{"name":"萨沙","id":15022221,"picId":0,"img1v1Id":18686200114669622,"briefDesc":"","picUrl":"http://p4.music.126.net/6y-UleORITEDbvrOLV0Q8A==/5639395138885805.jpg","img1v1Url":"http://p4.music.126.net/VnZiScyynLG7atLIZ2YPkw==/18686200114669622.jpg","albumSize":0,"alias":[],"trans":"","musicSize":0,"topicPerson":0,"img1v1Id_str":"18686200114669622"},"artistName":"萨沙","imgurl":"http://p3.music.126.net/jczpQNLZLyY_ZHJL7nIOBA==/109951163381051670.jpg","imgurl16v9":"http://p3.music.126.net/eIeguKnAoIWztyvk5Om4dA==/109951163381045975.jpg","artists":[{"id":15022221,"name":"萨沙"},{"id":15022294,"name":"NaCl盐"},{"id":13110238,"name":"李霖辉"},{"id":12264430,"name":"冯朗朗"},{"id":15021287,"name":"刘洋"},{"id":1081635,"name":"二珂"},{"id":15021288,"name":"周士原"}],"urlInfo":null,"price":0,"duration":113000,"playCount":27821}}

event.json: {"msg":"#石头计划# “你，真是全世界最伤心的字眼啊，皱皱眉，将我熄灭”，爱情就像一场烟花，绽放的一瞬美的惊艳，可结局总是不完美，多少人在这世间苦苦找寻所谓“永恒”。“伤痛需要被宣泄、刺破悲伤才会变好”，这是@悬铃木 新曲《我就乐意这样寂寞了》表达的处世哲学，如果你还在找寻和自己和解的方式，这里，或许可以告诉你些什么……[爱心]","song":{"name":"我就乐意这样寂寞了","id":862100563,"position":1,"alias":[],"status":0,"fee":8,"copyrightId":748010,"disc":"","no":1,"artists":[{"name":"悬铃木","id":787169,"picId":0,"img1v1Id":0,"briefDesc":"","picUrl":"http://p1.music.126.net/6y-UleORITEDbvrOLV0Q8A==/5639395138885805.jpg","img1v1Url":"http://p1.music.126.net/6y-UleORITEDbvrOLV0Q8A==/5639395138885805.jpg","albumSize":0,"alias":[],"trans":"","musicSize":0}],"album":{"name":"我就乐意这样寂寞了","id":71614773,"type":"EP/Single","size":2,"picId":109951163378446049,"blurPicUrl":"http://p1.music.126.net/oMwV3d6dGc5C7OczSEFM5w==/109951163378446049.jpg","companyId":0,"pic":109951163378446049,"picUrl":"http://p1.music.126.net/oMwV3d6dGc5C7OczSEFM5w==/109951163378446049.jpg","publishTime":1530115200007,"description":"","tags":"","company":"","briefDesc":"","artist":{"name":"","id":0,"picId":0,"img1v1Id":0,"briefDesc":"","picUrl":"http://p1.music.126.net/6y-UleORITEDbvrOLV0Q8A==/5639395138885805.jpg","img1v1Url":"http://p1.music.126.net/6y-UleORITEDbvrOLV0Q8A==/5639395138885805.jpg","albumSize":0,"alias":[],"trans":"","musicSize":0},"songs":[],"alias":[],"status":0,"copyrightId":748010,"commentThreadId":"R_AL_3_71614773","artists":[{"name":"悬铃木","id":787169,"picId":0,"img1v1Id":0,"briefDesc":"","picUrl":"http://p1.music.126.net/6y-UleORITEDbvrOLV0Q8A==/5639395138885805.jpg","img1v1Url":"http://p1.music.126.net/6y-UleORITEDbvrOLV0Q8A==/5639395138885805.jpg","albumSize":0,"alias":[],"trans":"","musicSize":0}],"img80x80":"http://p1.music.126.net/oMwV3d6dGc5C7OczSEFM5w==/109951163378446049.jpg?param=80x80x1"},"starred":false,"popularity":0.0,"score":0,"starredNum":0,"duration":256176,"playedNum":0,"dayPlays":0,"hearTime":0,"ringtone":null,"crbt":null,"audition":null,"copyFrom":"","commentThreadId":"R_SO_4_862100563","rtUrl":null,"ftype":0,"rtUrls":[],"copyright":0,"rurl":null,"mvid":0,"bMusic":{"name":"","id":2277717024,"size":4099805,"extension":"mp3","sr":44100,"dfsId":0,"bit
